ing: 1 slice watermelon, seeded and cut into small pieces
2 tablespoons cosmopolitan drink mix (such as SmirnoffÂ® Cocktails)
des: "A cool refreshing watermelon strawberry summer drink."
ins: Combine white cranberry juice, strawberries, watermelon, and cosmopolitan drink mix in a blender; pulse until well blended. Add ice and blend until desired consistency is reached; pour into a martini glass.
